<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implement a loop-aware load elimination pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It uses LoopAccessAnalysis to identify loop-carried dependences with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distance of one between stores and loads.  These form the candidates for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation.  The source value of each store then propagated to the user</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the corresponding load.  This makes the load dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pass can also version the loop and add memchecks in order to prove that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may-aliasing stores can&#39;t change the value in memory before it&#39;s read by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if the dependence from the store to the load has an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// absolute distance of one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// E.g. A&#91;i+1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; (or A&#91;i-1&#93; = A&#91;i&#93; for descending loop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e">isDependenceDistanceOfOne</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution">PredicatedScalarEvolution</a> &amp;PSE,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LoadPtr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>-&gt;getPointerOperand();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LoadPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5ab2d0b0f0b8ceec3b907184e7567197">getPointerAddressSpace</a>() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">               StorePtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a5ab2d0b0f0b8ceec3b907184e7567197">getPointerAddressSpace</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(LoadType) ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeSizeInBits(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad12126a4bea94833696dc67e0431e829">getLoadStoreType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should be a known dependence&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t StrideLoad = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8021a49018596bcbea563e6d5cac9a70">getPtrStride</a>(PSE, LoadType, LoadPtr, L).value&#95;or(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t StrideStore = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8021a49018596bcbea563e6d5cac9a70">getPtrStride</a>(PSE, LoadType, StorePtr, L).value&#95;or(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StrideLoad || !StrideStore || StrideLoad != StrideStore)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This check for stride values other than 1 and -1 can be eliminated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, doing so may cause the LoopAccessAnalysis to overcompensate,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generating numerous non-wrap runtime checks that may undermine the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// benefits of load elimination. To safely implement support for non-unit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// strides, we would need to ensure either that the processed case does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require these additional checks, or improve the LAA to handle them more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficiently, or potentially both.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::abs(StrideLoad) != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TypeByteSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeAllocSize(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(LoadType));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LoadPtrSCEV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(PSE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution/#ae0994d8207b94ad22ecebc1a6bc580f1">getSCEV</a>(LoadPtr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;StorePtrSCEV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(PSE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution/#ae0994d8207b94ad22ecebc1a6bc580f1">getSCEV</a>(StorePtr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t need to check non-wrapping here because forward/backward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependence wouldn&#39;t be valid if these weren&#39;t monotonic accesses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Dist = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PSE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution/#a10ca5eacc61b5669880de2f8b0cff33c">getSE</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a8bcb86d8d126d95b0dc05f09e8f3df96">getMinusSCEV</a>(StorePtrSCEV, LoadPtrSCEV));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Dist)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != InstOrder.end() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No index for instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If a load has multiple candidates associated (i.e. different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// stores), it means that it could be forwarding from multiple stores</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// depending on control flow.  Remove these candidates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Here, we rely on LAA to include the relevant loop-independent dependences.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LAA is known to omit these in the very simple case when the read and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// write within an alias set always takes place using the &#42;same&#42; pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// However, we know that this is not the case here, i.e. we can rely on LAA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to provide us with loop-independent dependences for the cases we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// interested.  Consider the case for example where a loop-independent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dependece S1-&gt;S2 invalidates the forwarding S3-&gt;S2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         A&#91;i&#93;   = ...   (S1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         ...    = A&#91;i&#93;  (S2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         A&#91;i+1&#93; = ...   (S3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LAA will perform dependence analysis here because there are two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#42;different&#42; pointers involved in the same alias set (&amp;A&#91;i&#93; and &amp;A&#91;i+1&#93;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a">removeDependencesFromMultipleStores</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::forward&#95;list&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate&gt; &amp;Candidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Store is nullptr it means that we have multiple stores forwarding to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">LoadToSingleCandT =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;LoadInst &#42;, const StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate &#42;&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LoadToSingleCandT LoadToSingleCand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Cand : Candidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewElt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LoadToSingleCandT::iterator Iter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::tie(Iter, NewElt) =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LoadToSingleCand.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Cand.Load, &amp;Cand));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewElt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &#42;&amp;OtherCand = Iter-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Already multiple stores forward to this load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherCand == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the very basic case when the two stores are in the same block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so deciding which one forwards is easy.  The later one forwards as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// long as they both have a dependence distance of one to the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cand.Store-&gt;getParent() == OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Cand.isDependenceDistanceOfOne(PSE, L) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af7b88a2a7449e4edc75721e2ab686d9e">isDependenceDistanceOfOne</a>(PSE, L)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// They are in the same block, the later one will forward to the load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(OtherCand-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#af54830aebaed98b40bb2157388e08e36">Store</a>) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(Cand.Store))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OtherCand = &amp;Cand;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">          OtherCand = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Candidates.remove&#95;if(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;Cand) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoadToSingleCand&#91;Cand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate/#ac2caa7a270983aba3db7f156957c6adc">Load</a>&#93; != &amp;Cand) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Removing from candidates: \\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; Cand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  The load may have multiple stores forwarding to &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;it\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Given two pointers operations by their RuntimePointerChecking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// indices, return true if they require an alias check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We need a check if one is a pointer for a candidate load and the other is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a pointer for a possibly intervening store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a3e12473d43a9493e5189ce72f4ede0c3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a3e12473d43a9493e5189ce72f4ede0c3">needsChecking</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PtrIdx1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PtrIdx2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;PtrsWrittenOnFwdingPath,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;CandLoadPtrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ptr1 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LAI.getRuntimePointerChecking()-&gt;getPointerInfo(PtrIdx1).PointerValue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ptr2 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LAI.getRuntimePointerChecking()-&gt;getPointerInfo(PtrIdx2).PointerValue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((PtrsWrittenOnFwdingPath.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Ptr1) &amp;&amp; CandLoadPtrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Ptr2)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (PtrsWrittenOnFwdingPath.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Ptr2) &amp;&amp; CandLoadPtrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(Ptr1)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return pointers that are possibly written to on the path from a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// forwarding store to a load.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// These pointers need to be alias-checked against the forwarding candidates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a8ec02c6710c255838a2c5f10e078c8ba"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a8ec02c6710c255838a2c5f10e078c8ba">findPointersWrittenOnForwardingPath</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate&gt;</a> &amp;Candidates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From FirstStore to LastLoad neither of the elimination candidate loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should overlap with any of the stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st1 C&#91;i&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld1 B&#91;i&#93; &lt;-------,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld0 A&#91;i&#93; &lt;----,  |              &#42; LastLoad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...           |  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st2 E&#91;i&#93;      |  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st3 B&#91;i+1&#93; -- | -&#39;              &#42; FirstStore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st0 A&#91;i+1&#93; ---&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st4 D&#91;i&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// st0 forwards to ld0 if the accesses in st4 and st1 don&#39;t overlap with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;LastLoad =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab4e6de707bff0fe8081c4da0711bba07">llvm::max&#95;element</a>(Candidates,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.Load) &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a2b110fde5b0a649629622b90343fb691">getInstrIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Load);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &#125;)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Top-level driver for each loop: find store-&gt;load forwarding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// candidates, add run-time checks and perform transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a1b795b0cd98521a7cf4ab769d9207258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a1b795b0cd98521a7cf4ab769d9207258">processLoop</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nIn \\&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; L-&gt;getHeader()-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\&quot; checking &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;L &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for store-to-load forwarding cases across the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backedge. E.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %x = load %gep&#95;i</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         = ... %x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      store %y, %gep&#95;i&#95;plus&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ph:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %x.initial = load %gep&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %x.storeforward = phi &#91;%x.initial, %ph&#93; &#91;%y, %loop&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %x = load %gep&#95;i            &lt;---- now dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//         = ... %x.storeforward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      store %y, %gep&#95;i&#95;plus&#95;1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First start with store-&gt;load dependences.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StoreToLoadDependences = <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#ad870908842303e62050abc131f00f91f">findStoreToLoadDependences</a>(LAI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreToLoadDependences.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate an index for each load and store according to the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// program order.  This will be used later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstOrder = LAI.getDepChecker().generateInstructionOrderMap();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To keep things simple for now, remove those where the load is potentially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fed by multiple stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/loadeliminationforloop/#a0600a51b42956b4e041baa101a3c047a">removeDependencesFromMultipleStores</a>(StoreToLoadDependences);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Filter the candidates further.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate, 4&gt;</a> Candidates;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-looploadelimination-cpp-/storetoloadforwardingcandidate">StoreToLoadForwardingCandidate</a> &amp;Cand : StoreToLoadDependences) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that the stored values is available everywhere in the loop in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the load is conditional we can&#39;t hoist its 0-iteration instance to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the preheader because that would make it unconditional.  Thus we would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access a memory location that the original loop did not access.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a7b98d1a31b5292d6b2f4772277c8147f">isLoadConditional</a>(Cand.Load, L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether the SCEV difference is the same as the induction step,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thus we load the value in the next iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Cand.isDependenceDistanceOfOne(PSE, L))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"></CodeLine>
